events.Message: New Amazon drone delivery service promises to drop packages almost near your house
Breaking Amazon workers now allowed to blink twice per shift
Exciting Amazon Prime now includes 1-day shipping on burnout for warehouse employees
Shocking Amazon discovered to be evading taxes in countries that actually collect them
Local business celebrates being crushed by Amazon ahead of schedule
Amazon introduces a new 5-minute bathroom break lottery for employees
New Amazon initiative zero carbon emissions by replacing all human workers with robots
Customers rejoice Amazon promises to ship empathy in 2 years or less
Record profits Amazon achieves goal of same-day delivery on all ethical concerns
Ambitious Amazon plans to deliver packages faster than you can regret your purchase
Shein launches new collection clothes for one-time use literally
Unbelievable shein promises 0.01 transparency in its supply chain
Leaked Shein workers allowed to sleep 3 hours if they finish 500 garments a day
Flash sale buy two dresses and get an environmental crisis for free
Shein claims sustainability is key they`ve stopped using plastic bags in employee lunches
New eco-friendly line by shein made with 5 sustainable materials and 95 marketing
Shein sets new speed record for fast fashion products outliving their trend by 10 minutes
Rumor has it shein employees are now trained to sew with their eyes closed for maximum speed
In a bold move shein partners with landfills for same-day delivery
Shein announces innovative recycling program return your clothes and we’ll burn them for you
Lawsuit filed after it was revealed that some products might actually not cause cancer
Bayer`s latest innovation weed killer that targets both weeds and local ecosystems
Groundbreaking study by pesticide maker proves bees are totally fine with fewer numbers
Farmers celebrate Bayer`s new seeds that grow best in toxic waste environments
Exciting news Bayer discovers new side effects for a medication already on the market for 30 years
Good news Bayer promises their new product won`t harm you as long as you don`t inhale, touch, or look at it directly
Record settlement Bayer sets aside 10 billion to pay off people who used their products as directed
In a shocking twist Bayer announces a new pill where only 25 side effects are life-threatening
Latest breakthrough from Bayer genetically modified crops that outgrow regulations
Local rivers thank bayer`s fertilizers for their new fluorescent glow
The bitten fruit company releases a new iPhone with a revolutionary feature: USB-C port, only 10 years in the making.
Rumors suggest the next iPhone will be completely transparent—so invisible, you won’t see it... or your money.
Steve Jobs would have definitely approved selling Mac Pro wheels for just $700 each.
In a bold move, Apple patents the right to charge you for breathing near an Apple Store.
Users thrilled to discover that the latest iOS update makes their iPhone reboot 5 seconds faster after every crash.
The tech giant introduces the new Apple Watch, now with a feature that reminds you every hour how broke you are.
Apple promises that their new AirPods will be so small, you’ll lose them before you even take them out of the box.
After the iPhone 15 success, Apple plans to release the iPhone 16, this time with a charger sold separately... in pieces.
Fans rejoice as the latest security patch finally fixes the issue of having too much money left in your wallet.
Sources say Apple’s next big product will be the `Apple Breath, a device that tracks how often you lose your breath staring at their prices.
British American Tobacco announces new eco-friendly cigarettes that are 99% smoke... and 1% guilt
Big tobacco finally solves the problem of cancer-causing products: they now come in fancier packaging
Sources reveal tobacco execs may have started believing their own ads about “smooth and refreshing” health benefits
In a bold move, the cigarette giant launches a campaign promoting “smoke responsibly” while also doubling advertising to teens
Shocking studies find cigarettes might not be part of a balanced diet after all, confirms british american tobacco
The “fresh air” marketing campaign takes a surprising turn with slogans like “our smoke has never been more transparent”
British american tobacco sets new sustainability goals: all cigarette butts to be recycled into... more cigarettes
Rumors suggest the tobacco industry is working on a new filter that makes the tar invisible to the naked eye
After years of research, british american tobacco proudly introduces cigarettes that only slightly shorten your lifespan
Cigarette sales reach new highs as british american tobacco unveils their latest product “lungs of steel” training program
